en: It is year {current_year}. Complete the ritual every year until year {max_year} to win the game!
It is week {current_week}. Complete the ritual before winter comes in {year_winter} to cleanse the blight.

[b]Energy[/b]
You start each turn with 3 energy. When you play a card, lose energy equal to its energy cost (written in the top right of the card). Some cards cost 0 energy. Cards can only be played if you have sufficient energy to pay for them. You regain your energy at the start of the next turn.
Draw 5 cards per turn. For each Card Fragment, draw an additional card one turn out of three.
Your deck contains {deck_cards} cards. Cards are drawn from your deck. Once it is empty, your discard pile will be shuffled and inserted into your deck.
Click here to end your turn. Your plants will grow, and the game will move to the next week.
After playing a card, it is moved to your discard pile. Once your deck runs out of cards, your discard pile is shuffled and inserted into your deck.
To complete the ritual and end the year, you must generate {count} [img]{path}[/img]. When a plant is harvested a yellow tile, you gain [img]{path}[/img] equal to its Yield.

This turn, the blight is attacking you with a strength of {strength}. To protect yourself, you must generate at least {strength} [img]{path}[/img] before ending your turn. When a plant is harvested on a purple tile, you gain [img]{path}[/img] equal to its Yield.

This turn, the blight is not attacking you. During a turn when the blight is attacking you, you must generate [img]{path}[/img] equal to the strength of its attack. When a plant is harvested on a purple tile, you gain [img]{path}[/img] equal to its Yield.
This action affects {size} tile(s) on the farm.
This card plants seeds on {size} tile(s) on the farm.
This card costs {cost} energy to play.
This seed will provide {yield} base yield when it is harvested. Since this card has a size of {size}, the total yield it will produce is {total_yield}
This seed will take {duration} weeks to grow.
Plant Seed cards on both the yellow side and the purple side of your farm. The purple side is important - those plants will be used to protect you from the Blight.
You have plants ready for harvest on the yellow side of your farm. Play Scythe cards to harvest them and advance the cleansing ritual.
The Blight will attack you next turn. Only harvest plants on the purple side of your farm when the Blight is attacking you.
The Blight is attacking you! Use your Scythe cards to harvest at least {count} [img]{path}[/img] to protect yourself.
Continue to protect yourself from the Blight's attacks while harvesting plants on the yellow side of your farm to complete the ritual.
Use the Shop and Events to gain more cards, upgrade your cards, and make your deck stronger. When you're ready, click Next Year to continue.
You have no more Energy. Click End Turn on the bottom right to replenish your energy and give your plants time to grow.
The Blight is attacking you! You have no Harvest cards in your hand, so you can't collect [img]{path}[/img] to protect yourself. At the end of the turn, the Blight will deal damage to you.
The Blight dealt damage to you. You've taken one blight damage and your farm has lost a few tiles. The lost tiles will be restored, but if you take a total of 5 blight damage, you lose.

The Blight is attacking you! You have no plants on the purple side that are ready to harvest, so you can't generate [img]{path}[/img] to protect yourself. At the end of the turn, the Blight will deal damage to you.
Make sure to empty the Shop, do this year's Event, and perform an Upgrade (if available) before going to the next year.
Upgrade is only available at the end of certain years.
